title: Design of Magnetohydrodynamic (MHD) Thruster
intro: Inspired by the plasma channel concept, this design is an optimized version of the previous model. The thruster is equipped with four neodymium magnets secured by fasteners, and electrodes are attached to apply the desired voltage.

sections.title: Overview
sections.content: This design was created in Onshape. It includes front, side, and isometric views of the individual parts.

sections.title: Draft
sections.content: The draft of the design was created in Onshape. All dimensions are in millimeters.

sections.title: Exploded View
sections.content: The exploded view illustrates all individual parts before final assembly.

sections.title: Exploded View Draft
sections.content: This draft displays all major components, including the Inlet Bellmouth, Inlet Duct, Flow Region, Converging Section, Venturi Opening Exhaust, and Outlet.
